PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-14802006-12-06,  ,  ,  ,  LAB
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of NORMAN RIVARD of Aurora, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and orders that NORMAN RIVARD be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective January 15, 2007.
